TunableEnum.name: BEACH_LOCATOR_TAG
TunableEnum.description: The tag we can use to get the beach locator definition.

TunableList.name: OCEAN_DATA
TunableList.description: The species-age mapping to ocean data. This defines what ages and species can wade in the water and what the water level restrictions are as well as beach portal access objects.

TunableTuple.description: The ages and their ocean data.

TunableTuple.name: ocean_data
TunableTuple.description: The ocean data for this Age.

TunableVariant.name: beach_portal_data
TunableVariant.description: An optional portal definition to allow sims to swim in the ocean. Without this, Sims at this age and species cannot swim in the ocean.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The portals this age/species will use to swim in the ocean.

TunableVariant.name: swimwear_change_outfit_reason
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, the outfit change reason that determines which outfit category a Sim automatically changes into when entering water.

Tunable.name: swimwear_change_water_depth
Tunable.description: If a Sim's path includes water where the depth is at least the tuned value, in meters, they will switch into the outfit based on the outfit change reasonat the start of the path.

TunableTuple.name: wading_interval
TunableTuple.description: The wading interval for Sims at this age and species. The lower bound indicates the minimum water height required to apply the wading walkstyle, and the upper bound indicates the maximum height we can walk into the water until we can potentially swim.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: water_depth_error
Tunable.description: The error, in meters, that we allow for the swimming beach portals.

TunableEnum.name: species
TunableEnum.description: The extended species that this data is for.
